comments.text: Sir Corgi of Couchshire, I presume? 😂🎩 Such elegance, Yoshi!
Just waiting for his tea and crumpets, I bet. You have a posh pup on your hands! 🍵🐾
Why do I feel like he's about to give me a lecture on proper couch etiquette? 🛋️🎩 Yoshi, you're too distinguished for words!
That paw dangle is the epitome of sophistication. If only I could be this posh just sitting on a couch!
